name: An Evening with the Unhallowed
description:
Game Description:

Welcome to An Evening with the Unhallowed where the roll of the die determines the adventure that awaits you and your protective knight. This was our first attempt at making games for a game jam and we would like to thank you for playing!

 ----------------------------
Controls: Hold Left Mouse Button to aim and release to shoot.
Hold Right Mouse Button to raise your shield and release to drop it.

F - Use your shield as a platform to jump from.
E - Interact with objects.
A - Move Left
D - Move Right
Space - Jump
----------------------------
Game Design: - Joshua Dharmawan - William Wong - Shaun Wong
Programmers: - Joshua Dharmawan - Shaun Wong - Kok Han Yi
Character Art & Animation: - William Wong - Kent Alvaro
Environment Art: - Fion Lim

VFX: - Kent Alvaro
